Source Ultimate Combat pg. 164

Statistics

Category Ammunition; Proficiency Siege Engine

Description

This siege engine firearm ammunition can be loaded in a cannon or a fiend's mouth cannon. It is especially good at tearing through sails and dirigibles dealing double its normal damage to those forms of propulsion.

When fired at a creature, on a hit, the creature must succeed at a DC 20 Fortitude saving throw or be knocked prone.
